column1: PLEASE STOP THIS ENVIRONMENTAL TRAVESTY WHICH COULD POLLUTE EARTH’S OCEANS
Have none of these people seen Godzilla???

Korea is a marine polluted country that dumps large amounts of garbage & manure into the sea. Korea exports garbage that cannot be disposed of domestically. The stomach of Korean oysters, clams, mussels, etc. contains a large amount of minuscule plastic & E.coli.

Korea refuses to release data on treated water from the Wolseong NPP. Radioactively contaminated water leaked into the sea from Wolseong NPP. Korea's groundwater is polluted with 157 times more uranium water than standard. Korea has hidden it for many years.

Every nuclear plant discharges tritium. It’s a misconception that nuclear is 100% clean. Tritium isn’t as toxic as most other radioactive compounds   Glowing EXIT signs and gun night sights glow from tritium content.
